title: BRIEF-HTC Corp posts 52.6 pct fall in August sales
text:
BRIEF-HTC Corp posts 52.6 pct fall in August sales Sept 4 
* Says August sales at T$6.89 billion ($211.93 million), down 52.62 percent y/y 
Source text in Chinese:
